data.text: @bagchasinjustin @notyour48486977 @red_hoodie_69 @Variety I won't but the guy's making up random shit to justify his point without even knowing the context of it in the movie
@notyour48486977 @bagchasinjustin @red_hoodie_69 @Variety And since it completely went over your head a negative pulse is another way of saying dead
@notyour48486977 @bagchasinjustin @red_hoodie_69 @Variety I'm replying to someone else as a joke mind your own business fellow "motivational speaker" 💀💀

@notyour48486977 @red_hoodie_69 @bagchasinjustin @Variety Now I have half a mind to just spoil you with what in the movie justifies his armor's looks but you saying 2022 doesn't mean anything, his armor doesn't look old, it looks homemade as it should
@NegativePuIse67 @bagchasinjustin @red_hoodie_69 @Variety Obviously not what I said but your profile name kinda says all I need to know about you 😂
@red_hoodie_69 @bagchasinjustin @NegativePuIse67 @Variety See being mean again 😂 be happy. I’m not your problem.
@NegativePuIse67 @red_hoodie_69 @bagchasinjustin @Variety Haha so funny. Haha…. No. I want Batman to look like he’s in the year 2022. Panache with a bit of armor.

@RGXSuperSonic @notyour48486977 @Variety I know it’s not the original idea, just saying we’ve never had a live action Batman with the actual idea put on the suit. I like the design personally, it’s really just a subjective thing
@red_hoodie_69 @notyour48486977 @bagchasinjustin @Variety He wants Batman to look like a black hole I guess 💀
